q: As well as the cast of a traditional pantomime, the show also includes young people acting as the judges of Britain's Got Talent, Simon Cowell , Amanda Holden and Piers Morgan . Mrs Twine said: We were all set to do the show, but the heavy snow put a stop to it. "Even if we could have opened the school we wouldn't have had an audience. "But, luckily the panto doesn't have a Christmas theme, so it's fine to put on now. Gerald Ford , who produces the show with his wife Michelle, said he wanted Donald Rumsfeld to appear as a witness in a lawsuit, testifying about why aggressive interrogation techniques like water-boarding are sometimes needed during wartime. It's an episode about moral relativism about what is considered torture and what is not, Robert Gerald Ford said. continue to raise money in his U.S. House campaign fund and later transfer that to campaign for governor if he decides to run. Jackie Walorski said she expected Mike Pence to abide by Mitch Daniels ' wishes. He and I are aligned virtually down the line on conservative and fiscal issues. I'm excited for any door Mike Pence walks through, she said. "Obviously it'd be great for the state of Indiana." Mike Pence is from Columbus and was an attorney before running unsuccessfully for Congress against Democrat Phil Sharp in 1988 and 1990.
